"Shirase": "Can you hear me? This is Shirase."
"I did it, I repaired the robot! And it's all thanks to you."
"I want to thank you in person, so stop by next time you're in the camp, okay?"
"I did it, I repaired the robot!"
"I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you so much."
"When you return to the camp, please be sure to come take a look!"
